pgs_id.description: PGS Catalog score ID(s), if a list separate with commas

pgp_id.description: PGS Catalog publication ID(s), if a list separate with commas

trait_efo.description: PGS Catalog trait ID(s), if a list separate with commas

min_overlap.description: Minimum proportion of variants in target genomic data matched in the provided scorefile

max_memory.description: The maximum memory used by a workflow process (worker pod limit). String uses nextflow format e.g. '4.GB'

max_cpus.description: The maximum number of CPUs used by workflow process (worker pod limit).

target_build.description: Genome build of target (i.e. input) genomes
